name: Spinning Axe
rules_text:
QUICK-DRAW (This has REACTION. When you play it, attach it to a unit you control.)
EQUIP (Attach this to a unit you control.)
TEMPORARY (If this is unattached, kill it at the start of its controller’s Beginning Phase, before scoring.)

params.summary: This has REACTION. When you play it, attach it to a unit you control.
Attach this to a unit you control.
If this is unattached, kill it at the start of its controller’s Beginning Phase, before scoring.
